review_text:
The zhajiangmian (noodles with assorted veges and beans) in beijing taste different than those we get in Malaysia. The place was packed when we got there around 1pm but luckily there was still a table for us. We ordered the noodles and it came in a huge portion for a small eater like me. The noodles was very tasty -...
